releaseReferenceFromContainer().Description: Do not use. Releases a reference to the object that was owned by the container of the object, closing the object if the last reference was released.
releaseReferenceFromContainer().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 16

releaseReference().Description: Releases a reference to the object, closing the object if the last reference was released.

Throws: if the last reference to the object has already been released.
acquireReference().Description: Acquires a reference to the object.

onAllReferencesReleasedFromContainer().Description: Do not use. Called when the last reference to the object was released by a call to @B_android#database#sqlite#SQLiteClosable#releaseReferenceFromContainer_E@.
onAllReferencesReleasedFromContainer().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 16

close().Description: Releases a reference to the object, closing the object if the last reference was released. Calling this method is equivalent to calling @B_android#database#sqlite#SQLiteClosable#releaseReference_E@.

onAllReferencesReleased().Description: Called when the last reference to the object was released by a call to @B_android#database#sqlite#SQLiteClosable#releaseReference_E@ or @B_android#database#sqlite#SQLiteClosable#close_E@.

ClassDesc: An object created from a SQLiteDatabase that can be closed. This class implements a primitive reference counting scheme for database objects.
